type.name: org.gradle.api.resources.Resource
type.description: A generic resource of some kind. Only describes the resource. There are more specific interface that extend this one and specify ways of accessing the resource's content.

method.name: getBaseName
method.description:
Short name that concisely describes this resource

returns:concise base name, should not be null

method.name: getDisplayName
method.description:
Human readable name of this resource

returns:human readable name, should not be null

method.name: getURI
method.description:
Uniform resource identifier that uniquely describes this resource

returns:unique URI, should not be null

property.name: baseName
property.description:
Short name that concisely describes this resource

returns:concise base name, should not be null

property.name: displayName
property.description:
Human readable name of this resource

returns:human readable name, should not be null

property.name: uRI
property.description:
Uniform resource identifier that uniquely describes this resource

returns:unique URI, should not be null
